mapper.select: select DATA_TYPE, data_count, IRSL_DATE from (select DATA_TYPE, data_count, IRSL_DATE, row_number() over(partition by DATA_TYPE order by OP_DATE desc) as rn from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_DAY where IRSL_DATE = #{day} and DATA_TYPE in(1,2,3,22) ) t where t.rn = 1 order by DATA_TYPE

select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE from (select DATA_TYPE,DATA_COUNT,IRSL_DATE,DATA_DATE, row_number() over(partition by irsl_date order by DATA_DATE desc ) as rn from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_DAY where data_type= #{type} and substr(irsl_date,5) like #{month}||'%' ) t where t.rn=1 order by irsl_date

select * from (select a.DATA_TYPE, b.IRSL_DATE, b.data_count, a.datahour, b.op_date, row_number() over(partition by a.DATA_TYPE order by b.OP_DATE desc) as rn from (select DATA_TYPE, max(op_date) op_date, to_char(max(op_date), 'HH24') as datahour from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_DAY where IRSL_DATE =#{day} and DATA_TYPE in (1,2,3,22) group by DATA_TYPE) a left join (select DATA_TYPE, data_count, IRSL_DATE, op_date, to_char(op_date, 'HH24') as datahour from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_DAY where IRSL_DATE =#{yesterday} and DATA_TYPE in (1,2,3,22) ) b on a.DATA_TYPE = b.DATA_TYPE and a.datahour >= b.datahour) c where c.rn = 1 order by DATA_TYPE

SELECT DATA_TYPE, DATA_COUNT, IRSL_DATE, OP_DATE FROM (SELECT ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_COUNT, IRSL_DATE, OP_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY DATA_TYPE, IRSL_DATE ORDER BY OP_DATE DESC) AS DT_ORDER FROM SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_DAY T WHERE T.IRSL_DATE BETWEEN #{preDay}AND #{day} and t.DATA_TYPE=#{type}) X WHERE X.DT_ORDER = 1

SELECT DATA_TYPE, DATA_COUNT, IRSL_DATE, OP_DATE FROM (SELECT ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_COUNT, IRSL_DATE, OP_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY DATA_TYPE, IRSL_DATE ORDER BY OP_DATE DESC) AS DT_ORDER FROM SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_DAY T WHERE T.IRSL_DATE BETWEEN #{preDay} AND #{day} and t.DATA_TYPE=#{type}) X WHERE X.DT_ORDER = 1

select w.DATA_TYPE,w.DATA_COUNT,w.IRSL_DATE,w.op_date from sjpt_realtime_static_day w join ( select t.op_date from ( select a.*,row_number() over( order by op_date desc) as rn from sjpt_realtime_static_day a
a.data_type in
#{item}
order by a.op_date desc ) t where t.rn=1 ) q on w.op_date=q.op_date
w.data_type in
#{item}
order by data_type

select data_type, data_count as source_data_count, irsl_date, (data_count-lag(data_count) over (order by irsl_date)) as data_count from ( select data_type, data_count, irsl_date, row_number() over (partition by data_type, irsl_date order by data_count) as order_sn from sjpt_realtime_static_day t where t.data_type = #{type} and t.irsl_date BETWEEN #{preDay}AND #{day} ) x where order_sn = 1
